item.title: Cartrack tracks vehicles in multiple countries
item.description:
Source: Cartrack website. Cartrack, a company specializing in fleet management, insurance telematics, vehicle tracking, and recovery services, is expanding its presence. The company is capitalizing on the rising number of vehicles and the expanding telematics sector. Leveraging its Singapore office as a central hub, Cartrack has established new branches in Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand, the Philippines, and Hong Kong this year. Cartrack Singapore CEO, Evert Ong, highlighted the significant growth originating from both small and medium-sized enterprises and larger corporations aiming to enhance their fleet and workforce operations...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/cartrack-tracks-vehicles-in-multiple-countries/
